CommunityNews.text:
* Game Develop is now open source and can be improved and enhanced by anyone. Sources are available on GitHub and contributions are welcome!
* GDevelop is an online game creator based on Game Develop and is available since a few days: Go try the most advanced game creation web app. Compatible with tablets and bundled with awesome graphics assets.
CommunityNews.linkLabel2: Try GDevelop, the online game creator based on GD
